front.title: SW-4 Ion Cannon
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on your Y-wing or B-wing. May target a starship using 1 Force. Draw destiny. If destiny > target's defense value, all starship weapons deployed on target are lost, armor or maneuver = 0 and hyperspeed = 0.
front.lore: ArMek SW-4 turret-mounted ion cannon. Bursts of ionized energy fuse and overload target's mechanical and computer systems. Allows ships to be captured and boarded.

pulledBy: Lieutenant s'Too Vees (when at a docking bay)
